subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ exciting 24-year-old right-hander, Matt Harvey, dominated the Phillies and upstaged Roy Halladay, Philadelphia’s accomplished 35-year-old right-hander.
snippet: The Mets’ exciting 24-year-old right-hander, Matt Harvey, dominated the Phillies and upstaged Roy Halladay, Philadelphia’s accomplished 35-year-old right-hander.
